name: happy-hour
effect: Doubles prize money. Stacks with a held item. Only works once per battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.
